template.name: Categories CSV - Bulk Job Completed Successfully
template.description: Email notification template for Categories CSV Bulk Upload successful completion.
template.subject: Categories CSV - Bulk Job Completed Successfully
template.body:
Hello,

The processing of your bulk job has been completed successfully.

Bulk Job ID = {job_id}
Job Submission Date/Time: {date_time}

More details are available in the log file, at: {log_url}

Kaltura Customer Service

template.name: Categories CSV - Bulk Job Completed with Errors
template.description: Email notification template for Categories CSV Bulk Upload completion with errors.
template.subject: Categories CSV - Bulk Job Completed with some Errors
template.body:
Hello,

The processing of your bulk job has been completed, but with some errors.

Bulk Job ID = {job_id}
Job Submission Date/Time: {date_time}

More details are available in the log file, at: {log_url}

Kaltura Customer Service
